headline: These Were the 5 Worst-Performing Stocks in the Nasdaq-100 in 2024
summary: Now that we've shut the door on 2024, it's useful to look back at some of the best -- and, on the flip side, some of the worst -- performers of the year on the stock market.  Many outliers were in the tech sector, so it's worth taking a look at the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 index.  In order from steepest decline to narrowest, the five unloved were Intel (NASDAQ: INTC), MongoDB (NASDAQ: MDB), Biogen (NASDAQ: BIIB), DexCom (NASDAQ: DXCM), and Microchip Technology (NASDAQ: MCHP).
